query.description: (Required) Filter by addresses first encountered at this block number
(Required) Filter by addresses first encountered after this block number, not including this blocknumber
(Required) Filter by addresses first encountered after this block number, including this block number
(Required) Filter by addresses first encountered before this block number, not including this block number
(Required) Filter by addresses first encountered before this block number, including this block number
(Required) Filter by a specific address
(Required) Filter by addresses first encountered after this date
(Required) Filter by addresses first encountered after before date
(Required) Filter by addresses first encountered at this transaction hash
(Required) Filter by addresses of the specified type (EOA or CONTRACT)
(Required) The page number to return.
(Required) The number of results to return.
Format of the return payload. [Defaults] csv | json*
List of fields to include in the return payload - can only be used in combination with option format=csv.

query.description: (Required) Filter by transactions for this block number.
(Required) Filter by transactions for this "from" address.
(Required) Filter by transactions for this "to" address
(Required) Indicates whether or not to include functions (aka internal messages) information for each transaction, if available (false|true).
(Required) Indicates whether or not to include log information for each transaction, if available (false|true).
(Required) Decodes transactions input via known ABIs.
(Required) Indicates whether or not to include token transfers information for each transaction, if available (false|true).
(Required) Indicates whether or not to include price data with the results. (Options true, false.)
(Required) Filter by transactions which happened after this date.
(Required) Filter by transactions which happened before this date.
(Required) The validation method to be added to the response ( none, basic, full. (Default none))
(Required) The currency of the price information (usd or btc.) - only used in conjunction with includePrice.
(Required) The order in which to return the results (ascending or descending). By default, records are returned in descending order, so the most recent records are returned first.
(Required) The page number to return.
(Required) The number of records per page.
Format of the return payload. (Defaults csv | json*)
List of fields to include in the return payload - can only be used in combination with option format=csv.
